Last Updated: 10 - 10 - 2023
These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern the use of LAWYERS' PERSONAL DIGITAL ASSISTANT ("the Software"), a personal digital assistant software designed for legal professionals. By downloading, installing, or using the Software, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the Software.
1. License
1.1. License Grant: RiViPraMaKaTech Pvt. Ltd. grants you a non-exclusive, non-transferable, limited license to use the Software for your legal practice or professional use.
1.2. Restrictions: You may not copy, modify, reverse engineer, or distribute the Software. Unauthorized use may result in the termination of your license.
2. Privacy and Data Security
2.1. Data Collection: The Software may collect and store data, including but not limited to user settings and usage data. We are committed to protecting your data and will use it only as described in our Privacy Policy.
2.2. Security: We take data security seriously, but we cannot guarantee the security of your data. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login information and taking appropriate security measures.
3. Updates and Support
3.1. Software Updates: We may release updates, improvements, or bug fixes for the Software. It is your responsibility to keep your software up-to-date to ensure optimal performance.
3.2. Customer Support: We provide customer support for the Software. Contact us at [support email] for assistance or inquiries.
4. Intellectual Property
4.1. Ownership: RiViPraMaKaTech Pvt. Ltd. retains all rights, title, and interest in and to the Software, including all intellectual property rights.
4.2. User Content: Any content you create or upload using the Software remains your property. You grant RiViPraMaKaTech Pvt. Ltd. a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute your content solely for the purpose of providing and improving the Software.
5. Termination
5.1. Termination by User: You may terminate this agreement by discontinuing the use of the Software and uninstalling it from your devices.
5.2. Termination by RiViPraMaKaTech Pvt. Ltd. : We reserve the right to terminate your license and access to the Software at our discretion, with or without cause.
6. Limitation of Liability
6.1. Disclaimer: The Software is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. RiViPraMaKaTech Pvt. Ltd. disclaims all warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose.
6.2. Limitation of Liability: In no event shall RiViPraMaKaTech Pvt. Ltd. be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in any way connected with the use of the Software.
7. Governing Law
7.1. Jurisdiction: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of law principles.
8. Changes to Terms
8.1. Modification: RiViPraMaKaTech Pvt. Ltd. reserves the right to modify or update these Terms at any time. Updated Terms will be posted on our website or provided within the Software.
By using the Software, you agree to these Terms as well as any future updates or modifications. It is your responsibility to review these Terms periodically.
9. Contact Information
If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms, please contact us at lpdadeveloperteam@gmail.com
